alert.note: Alert for Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:14PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 400 PM MST... At 314 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, or 14 miles southwest of Ajo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument. This includes Route 85 between mile markers 62 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
